sentences.en: Objective To understand family characteristic and psychogenesis of hysteric.

sentences.en: THE treatment, in the early 1880s, of an Austrian hysteric called Anna O is generally regarded as the beginning of talking-it-through as a form of therapy.
sentences.cn: 在19世纪八十年代早期，对一个名为安娜·奥（Anna O）的澳大利亚癔病患者的治疗被认为是谈话治疗法（译者注：弗洛伊德称之为宣泄疗法）成为一种治疗手段的开端。
